trans-unit.source: Interface that is used by the host infrastructure for property editing to handle sorting and filtering functionality.
trans-unit.target: 由主機基礎結構針對屬性編輯用來處理排序和篩選功能的介面。

trans-unit.source: It is used to determine whether a particular object should be filtered out.
trans-unit.target: 它用來判斷特定物件是否應該篩選掉。

trans-unit.source: Used to set a new <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilter"></xref> on the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.IPropertyFilterTarget"></xref>.

Declaration of the event raised when a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilter"></xref> is changed through a call to <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.IPropertyFilterTarget.ApplyFilter*>.
trans-unit.target: 宣告事件的引發的時機<xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilter"></xref>變更透過<xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.IPropertyFilterTarget.ApplyFilter*>.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.IPropertyFilterTarget.ApplyFilter*>呼叫

trans-unit.source: Read-only property that returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilter"></xref> is a match for the object.
trans-unit.target: 唯讀屬性，傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilter"></xref>物件相符。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property filter matches the property filter target; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果屬性篩選條件相符的屬性篩選目標;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Used to determine whether this <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.IPropertyFilterTarget"></xref> is a match for a particular <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilterPredicate"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 用來判斷是否這<xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.IPropertyFilterTarget"></xref>特定的相符項目<xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilterPredicate"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if it there is a match between a property filter target and a property filter predicate; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果它沒有比對屬性篩選目標與屬性篩選述詞。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
